explains: adj. 散漫的；离题的；东拉西扯的；无层次的

sentences.en: The internet is making news more participatory, social and diverse, reviving the discursive characteristics of the era before the mass media.
sentences.cn: 互联网使新闻更具参与性、社会性和多样性，恢复了大众媒体出现之前那个时代的散漫特征。

sentences.en: But again, this requires an active and discursive attitude, and practice.
sentences.cn: 这再次要求积极商谈的态度和实践。

sentences.en: In one side, the emerging of performance art needs the presence of discursive concept.
sentences.cn: 在一方面，在表演艺术新出现的需求的话语概念的存在。
